'''caras''' is an [[Elvish]] word which means "moated fortress" (in [[Silvan Elvish]]) or "city" (in [[Noldorin]]/[[Sindarin]]).

The proper meaning of this word was "a built fort or dwelling surrounded by bulwarks"<ref name="PE17">{{PE|17}}, p. 84</ref> or a "circular earthwall with dike".<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 311</ref>

== Etymology ==
It derives from [[PQ]] *''karasse'', [[Sundocarmë|root]] √[[KAR]] "make, build".<ref name="PE17"/>

== See also ==
* [[Caras Galadhon]]
